org.drooms.api

Interface Strategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RandomNonSuicidalStrategy, RandomSuicidalStrategy

    public interface Strategy
    Represents a Player's strategy for a worm to move around on a Playground. This strategy should be implemented as a set of Drools business rules. This is the interface that competitors should implement in order to enter in the game.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.drools.builder.KnowledgeBuilder getKnowledgeBuilder(ClassLoader cls)
      Provide a means of obtaining a KnowledgeBase.
      String getName()
      Provide a name for the strategy.

    • Method Detail

      • getKnowledgeBuilder

        org.drools.builder.KnowledgeBuilder getKnowledgeBuilder(ClassLoader cls)
        Provide a means of obtaining a KnowledgeBase.
        Parameters:
        cls - A classloader to use for this. Implementations should make sure they use the provided classloader - otherwise the Game cannot guarantee that strategies are independent of each other.
        Returns:
        Means of obtaining a KnowledgeBase later.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Provide a name for the strategy.
        Returns:
        Name of the strategy.
